title: Earthenware Tea Set - Classic Floral Design by Heritage Ceramics
description: Introducing the Handcrafted Earthenware Tea Set - Classic Floral Design by Heritage Ceramics. This elegant tea set features a classic floral design with hand-painted details on durable earthenware. Perfect for afternoon tea or special occasions, it includes a teapot, cups, saucers, and a sugar bowl. Each piece is handcrafted using traditional techniques, resulting in a high-quality set that adds sophistication and charm to your tea time ritual.
key_features: Classic floral design with hand-painted details
Includes teapot, cups, saucers, and sugar bowl
Perfect for afternoon tea or special occasions
meta_title: Handcrafted Earthenware Tea Set - Classic Floral Design by Heritage Ceramics
meta_description: Shop the Handcrafted Earthenware Tea Set - Classic Floral Design by Heritage Ceramics. This elegant tea set features a classic floral design and is handcrafted from durable earthenware.
